column8: Emphasis4
Description
Text
DialogueText
Text
A human! Go away!
Hey, calm down! I'm the new forest ranger. Are you hurt? Do you need any help?
You are the ranger? Where have you been? Something has happened in this forest. A lot of the animals are suffering.
I've no time to explain, I'm here to help. Just follow me, I'll lead you and other animals out of the forest and take care of you. ALL of you.
No, all the insects are poisoned and I have no food to eat! I'm so hungry!\r
Wolf and I will scout for food and bring some to you.\r
Thanks! There are others who need help, please help them too! I can fly, but hunger has made me weak. I can't lift you but am able to lift some other animals.\r
You look weak, are you ok?
For sure! I'll save every life as I can!\r
Help me! Oink oink! I got stuck!\r
Don't worry, there are enough of us here to pull you out. Do you want to take a rest at my place and I can heal you?\r
That would be great. I can destroy rocks if I've enough speed. We need to escape this place.\r
The forest is one fire! Help! there are lots of animals here!
Let's go!
I want to find some honey to eat but I can't.
This forest is getting barren. Come with me, I'll find some for you.
Thanks. I'm good at stay in the air, if you shoot me to a direction, I can stay there no matter how heavy you are.
Really? You look so small!
Try me!
This is my place. Enjoy yourself, I'll go find others. I'll get back soon.
Help! We have a friend falling into a mud!
That's dangerous, let me help you!
You get heavy and dragged into the mud if you get into it. let's link together and try not fall into the mud yourself!
I can't stop jumping!
You look tired. I can try to find someone to help heal you.
Please!
